name: Monitorium
description:
Put your multitasking skills to the test in this frantic minigame collection! Individually, these games are a piece of cake, but together they're quite the challenge. Compete with your friends to see who can last the longest in this brutal gauntlet that requires you to use EVERY LETTER ON THE KEYBOARD, and be careful not to press the wrong keys!

If you can beat my high score of 747.24, you win not only the game but also my undying love and respect.
